alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 27 at 9:57PM CDT until October 27 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Foard County in northern Texas... Knox County in northern Texas... Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 957 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Goodlett to 10 miles northwest of Truscott to 10 miles northwest of Benjamin, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quanah, Crowell, Benjamin, Chillicothe, Thalia, Gilliland, Margaret, Goodlett, Vera, Medicine Mound, Truscott, Lazare, Rayland and Copper Breaks State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
